manual_trigger.description: Manual trigger execution - no input required
manual_trigger.note: Uses hardcoded values in 'Set for signerName and signerEmail' node

payload.subject: Contract Request
payload.bodyPlain: Please send me the contract for review...

sheets_trigger_row.description: New row data from Google Sheets trigger

template_options.note: To use different templates, update the templateId in 'Send Template Envelope' node

environment_switching.note: Update URLs in 'Connect to Docusign Account' node for production

webhook_form_html.description: HTML form example for webhook integration
webhook_form_html.code:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<body>
  <form action='YOUR_N8N_WEBHOOK_URL' method='post'>
    <input name='signerName' placeholder='Full Name' required>
    <input name='signerEmail' type='email' placeholder='Email' required>
    <button type='submit'>Send DocuSign</button>
  </form>
</body>
</html>

invalid_template.solution: Verify templateId exists and is shared with API user
invalid_template.check: Templates section in DocuSign web interface

authentication_failed.solution: Check Integration Key and Secret in n8n credentials
authentication_failed.check: Apps and Keys section in DocuSign Admin

account_access.solution: Ensure OAuth2 app has proper permissions
account_access.check: App permissions in DocuSign Admin panel
